Population stats

?

On this page, population statistics are plotted over time.

Drag to zoom, and double-click to zoom out. Use the input field in the bottom-left to set a rolling average.

Extra clarification for some of the stats displayed on this page
Death rate is the minimum death rate + extra death by toxic effects
Production value is the concentration of accumulated biomass
Gross production rate is the speed at which biomass is generated
Net production rate is the gross production minus cost of growth and protein expression
Selection pressure is scaled to keep up with the many orders of magnitude increase in "fitness"
eDNA uptake rate is the average rate of uptake of eDNA. This is fixed by default, but can be made evolvable.
